Segment.name: BCP
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of a Contract Pricing Proposal Transaction Set and transmit identifying numbers and dates

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ContractActionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the expected resultant type of contract action or current type of contract action

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: ChangeOrderSequenceNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the orderer identifying a specific change or revision to a previously transmitted transaction set

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification3
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Description1
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: Description2
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
